metadata.name: Abstract Art #1
metadata.description:
A 1/1  highly detailed abstract art NFT in Niffty-style, a piece created with passion by a humble stonemason and artist with a love for abstract art and NFTs. 

This piece is the first in my Abstract Art collection minted on foundation! All my NFTs will count as a membership to future products, services, and merchandise in the Niffty branding. I am creating more than NFTs with love. Niffty artwork will become a brand with merchandise and a website niffty.store which is currently in development. 

Picture Details 

Size 4096 x4096

Ultra HD 

Neon Highlights 

High Detailing
